name: Apollo 11 Landing Site
description: The first human landing on the Moon. Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin became the first humans to walk on the lunar surface.
significance: First human landing on the Moon

name: Apollo 12 Landing Site
description: Precision landing near the Surveyor 3 spacecraft. Demonstrated the ability to land at a specific target.

name: Apollo 14 Landing Site
description: Landing in the Fra Mauro formation. First mission to use the Modular Equipment Transporter (MET).
significance: First use of MET, longest lunar walk

name: Apollo 15 Landing Site
description: First 'J-mission' with extended stay and first use of the Lunar Roving Vehicle (LRV).
significance: First use of Lunar Roving Vehicle

name: Apollo 16 Landing Site
description: Landing in the Descartes Highlands. First mission to explore the lunar highlands.

name: Apollo 17 Landing Site
description: Final Apollo mission. First night launch and the only mission to include a scientist-astronaut.
